mapper.select: select STT_PW from STT_USER_INFO where STT_ID = #{STT_ID} and STT_STATUS = 10
select STT_NAME ,STT_ID ,STT_PW ,STT_LEVEL ,STT_DATE ,STT_CENTER ,STT_SEQ from STT_USER_INFO where STT_ID = #{STT_ID} and STT_PW = #{STT_PW} and STT_STATUS = 10

select * from STT_USER_INFO where
STT_SEQ > 0
STT_NAME != 'admin'
and STT_STATUS = 10
select min(date_format(STT_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d')) from STT_MST_INFO where STT_DTM > concat('2021-03-19','%')
select STT_MENU from STT_LOG_INFO group by STT_MENU
select count(SWA_SEQ) as memlog from SWA_MEM_INFO where SWA_SEQ > 0

SELECT SWA_SEQ ,SWA_CENTER ,SWA_NAME ,SWA_INNUM ,SWA_ID ,rowNum from ( SELECT SWA_SEQ ,SWA_CENTER ,SWA_NAME ,SWA_INNUM ,SWA_ID ,@row_num:=@row_num + 1 AS rowNum from SWA_MEM_INFO ,(SELECT @row_num := 0) rn order by SWA_CENTER ASC ) urn where rowNum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} order by rowNum
